# Graduation-Thesis-Multivariate-Frequency-Severity

This is a project applying Actuarial Modelling to Social Health Insurance in Ho Chi Minh City, 2014, where each visit has multiple expenses.

## Overview

The goal of this project is to analyze multivariate frequency and severity models using R.

## Installation

You can install the required packages using:

```{r}
install.packages(c("tidyverse", "actuar", "ggplot2", "MASS"))
```

## Example Analysis

```{r example, echo = TRUE}
data(cars)
summary(cars)
```

## Visualizations

```{r pressure_plot, echo = FALSE}
plot(pressure)
```
